steps.title: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card.
steps.content: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card. This will expose your card’s unique 12-digit number.

steps.title: Call Salik customer service at 1-800-SALIK, or 1-800-72545.
steps.content: Call Salik customer service at 1-800-SALIK, or 1-800-72545.

steps.title: Select your preferred language when prompted to by the automated system.
steps.content: Select your preferred language when prompted to by the automated system.

steps.title: Select option one and follow the instructions to refill, or recharge your Salik account.
steps.content: Select option one and follow the instructions to refill, or recharge your Salik account. After your Salik account is recharged, you will receive a verification message confirming your new account balance.

steps.title: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card.
steps.content: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card. This will expose your card’s unique 12-digit number.

steps.title: Compose a new text message on your mobile phone.
steps.content: Compose a new text message on your mobile phone.

steps.title: Type the following message into the compose field:
steps.content: Type the following message into the compose field: R*recharge card number*Salik account number*Salik PIN.

steps.title: Send the message to 5959.
steps.content: Send the message to 5959. You will receive a text message confirmation from Salik informing you that your Salik account has been successfully recharged.

steps.title: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card.
steps.content: Scratch off the film located on the back of your Salik Recharge Card. This will expose your card’s unique 12-digit number.

steps.title: Go to the Salik Services web page.
steps.content: Go to the Salik Services web page.

steps.title: Sign in to your Salik account with your username and password.
steps.content: Sign in to your Salik account with your username and password. Click on the link displayed below “New Online Account” if you need to register and create a new Salik account.

steps.title: Click on “Recharge,” then enter or select your payment details next to “Salik Recharge.
steps.content: Click on “Recharge,” then enter or select your payment details next to “Salik Recharge. ”

steps.title: Enter the 12-digit number displayed on the back of your Salik card.
steps.content: Enter the 12-digit number displayed on the back of your Salik card.

steps.title: Click on “Send.
steps.content: Click on “Send. ” The website will display your new Salik account balance, as well as the receipt number for the transaction.
